Sentencas: Bi4-xMxV2O11 (M = La, Gd) was prepared by solid state reactions.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and conductive properties of Bi4-xMxV2O11 (M = La, Gd; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.4) compounds

Sentencas: The amount of La and Gd in the (Bi4-xMxV2O11) was varied in the range of (0 <= x <= 0.4).
Titulo: Structural, thermal and conductive properties of Bi4-xMxV2O11 (M = La, Gd; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.4) compounds

Sentencas: The addition of La and Gd to Bi4V2O11 electrolyte Was found to stabilize the beta crystalline phase for x <= 0.3.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and conductive properties of Bi4-xMxV2O11 (M = La, Gd; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.4) compounds

Sentencas: In addition, the phase transition corresponding beta- to gamma-phases are evident in the ionic conductivity plots as well as in XRD, DSC profiles of x >= 0.3 samples.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and conductive properties of Bi4-xMxV2O11 (M = La, Gd; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.4) compounds

Sentencas: The highest ionic conductivity was observed in Bi3.9La0.1V2O11 and Bi3.8Gd0.2V2O11 samples in the range of 10(-3)-10(-4) S/cm for 700-500 degrees C. These results were supported by impedance spectroscopy, X-ray diffraction (XRD) and differential scanning calorimetry (DSC).
Titulo: Structural, thermal and conductive properties of Bi4-xMxV2O11 (M = La, Gd; 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.4) compounds
